description: With a zesty crunch and a hint of chocolate, this traditional Maltese dish is a rich and creamy baked dessert perfect for entertaining with friends and family.
keywords: Maltese Ricotta Pie with Chocolate & Orange
name: Maltese Ricotta Pie with Chocolate & Orange Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pierce the top of the pastry a few times with the fork and bake in the oven for 35 minutes before serving.
